attributes.action: dissolve this expense scandal hit parliament and call an immediate general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Parliament has lost all moral and political authority and so many MPs (with some honorable exceptions) have disgraced themselves so completely that their right to make laws for the rest of us has evaporated.

Lawmakers should never be lawbreakers and they should obey the spirit, as well as the letter, of the law.

The Prime Minister, our country’s leader, should say “enough is enough” - he should dissolve this parliament and call an immediate general election.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
